Item.Name: Forge
Item.Description: Melt raw metal ore into bars.

Item.Name: Loom
Item.Description: Weave raw fibers into bolts of cloth.

Item.Name: Butcher Shop
Item.Description: Harvest various parts from dead and live animals.

Item.Name: Stonecarver
Item.Description: Craft trinkets and statues from stone blocks.

Item.Name: Woodcarver
Item.Description: Craft trinkets and statues from wood.

Item.Name: Blacksmith
Item.Description: Forge metal bars into tools and various metal items.

Item.Name: Metalworker
Item.Description: Craft trinkets and statues from metal bars.

Item.Name: Machine Shop
Item.Description: Craft mechanical parts from metal bars.

Item.Name: Jeweler
Item.Description: Craft jewelry from metal bars and gems.

Item.Name: Tailor
Item.Description: Sew clothes and bags from bolts of cloth.

Item.Name: Tinker Bench
Item.Description: Research new mechanisms and mechanical parts.

Item.Name: Market Stall
Item.Description: Used by visiting merchants to trade goods.

Item.Name: Training Grounds
Item.Description: Train squads to increase combat skills.

Item.Name: Prospector Shop
Item.Description: Search stone and soil for slivers of metal.
